column1: # SOURCE: Synthetic data derived from historical_grid_electricity_prices-toy.csv with commercial/industrial markup
# DESCRIPTION: Monthly electricity prices for commercial/industrial users in Egypt (unsubsidized full-cost rates)
# LOGIC: Agricultural subsidized rates increased by 16.5% to reflect commercial/industrial pricing without subsidy
# ASSUMPTIONS: Commercial rates are consistently 16.5% higher than agricultural across all periods
# GENERATION_METHOD: Applied 1.165x markup to all subsidized agricultural rates

column2: original EGP documented with exchange rates

column1: # EXCHANGE_RATE_SOURCE: Central Bank of Egypt historical averages (from base toy dataset)
# COMPARISON_TO_SUBSIDIZED: Unsubsidized rates are 1.165x subsidized rates
